name: Stratiobee

abilities.name: Vigilant
abilities.desc: The possessor and its allies cannot fall asleep.

abilities.name: Hustle (Secret)
abilities.desc: Boosts the possessor's Attack stat, but lowers its accuracy.

description: Stratiobee are the higher tier in the colony who are assigned with a sole task of protecting the family from invaders. Their arms are equipped with a lance and shield, allowing them to fence off powerful foes. The wings are also larger and stronger, granting them an advantage in aerial battle.
